rename.from: Persistent growing high CPU usage without load.
rename.to: Persistent growing high CPU usage without active/passive scanner workload.

rename.from: Persistent growing high CPU usage without active/passive scanner workload.
rename.to: Persistent growing high CPU usage without active/passive scanner workload after Firefox calls websocket.

body:
Updates: 
- disabling websockets in settings doesn't help. 
- after ZAP was left for a while all 4 cores (100%) are used.

Could you provide a heap dump? That might contain sensitive data (creating new sessions should release most of it, assuming the CPU issue remains), only interested in `HttpRequestHeader` instances. though.
Aren't those in traces.txt the ones needed?

Those are thread dumps, they help know what's running and where but not why (not always), the heap dump would help to know that (e.g. `ZAP-ProxyThread-26` is "hanged" reading a request body, knowing the contents of the request header would clarify why).

That can be done with `jmap` e.g. `jmap -dump:file=heap.bin <ZAP_PID>`
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/technotes/tools/windows/jmap.html

If you don't want to share here you can send directly.
@thc202 could you please tell how to send the links to the uploaded dumps privately?

UPDATE: problem persists even after disabling passive scanner, and deleting most of the plugins.
The list of remaining ones:
![java-2020-08-24-11-15-25](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29713984/91020518-395a6980-e5fb-11ea-85e2-9a88ce9c2abd.png)

Email and public key to encrypt if needed:
https://keyserver.ubuntu.com/pks/lookup?search=0xC650B2EB170CE36613A164FAF29DBD3500548AA2&fingerprint=on&op=index

If the problem is in the proxy it doesn't matter the add-ons installed.
Please check your email for dumps. My proxy credentials and address are private information.

Update:
disabling all extensions (excluding dynssl) didn't help too.

rename.from: Persistent growing high CPU usage without active/passive scanner workload after Firefox calls websocket.
rename.to: Persistent growing high CPU usage with proxy

issue.title: Correctly read HTTP bodies

repository.name: zaproxy
repository.description: The ZAP by Checkmarx Core project

issue.body:
Correct length check when reading chunks of the body.

Fix #6138.

body: This issue has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
